description.ko: 순백의 공간 속에서 기하학적 파편으로 부서지는 흑요석 모놀리스를 통해 디지털 붕괴와 구조적 균형을 연구합니다.
description.en: A study of digital decay and structural balance, featuring an obsidian monolith shattering into geometric shards within a stark white void.

prompt: A brutalist #1A1A1A obsidian monolith suspended in a clinical #FFFFFF void, undergoing a violent geometric metamorphosis. The structure fractures into a cascade of sharp #808080 shards and #C0C0C0 digital scanline glitches. High-contrast cinematic lighting with razor-sharp raytraced reflections on fragmented glass. Chaos within order, pixel sorting effects, monochrome complexity, 8k resolution, capturing the perfect balance of a collapsing digital reality.
